name: The Dark Cabin
description:
The Dark Cabin

Your are lost in the forest, your car is broken and the only thing you see is a big cabin, Will you dare explore the entire house? 

A simple prototype game featuring:  

  • Chainsaw killer
  • Big house with many room
  • And toilet???

This game was made with CatLadyCreates asset pack:

https://catladycreates.itch.io/horror-assest-gb-studio

Go check her work it was her first tilesheet!

This is only my second game with Gb Studio and im probably the worst mape maker ever but i've try to do a "labyrinth" or something like that......

The game isn't very creepy but there is a bit of blood so be aware!
